statuses.WAITING_tooltip: Premium is awaiting payment. If payment has been made, please wait for our service to receive this information. It usually takes about 5 minutes
statuses.PAID_tooltip: Payment has been successfully received. The privileges will become available when the premium goes into the "Active" state
statuses.ACTIVE_tooltip: Premium is active, all premium accesses are enabled
statuses.EXPIRED_tooltip: Payment due date has expired. All payments are issued for one year
statuses.DISABLED_tooltip: Premium disabled due to expiration of usage time
statuses.DISABLED_TEMPORARILY_tooltip: Premium is temporarily disabled, you can resume it at any time
statuses.WAITING_FOR_EXTEND_tooltip: Premium is awaiting payment. If payment has been made, please wait for our service to receive this information. It usually takes about 5 minutes.

disablePremiumModal.title: Temporarily disable premium?
disablePremiumModal.description: This premium has the option of being temporarily disabled. The number of disconnected times is limited. You can resume your premium later.

premiumAccesses.description: In this section, you can see the total number of premium access and the number of consumed access. Please note that such accesses as receiving notifications, history, roles are multiplied, but do not give great advantages.

vk.title: Receive notifications via Vkontakte
vk.description: Enter your Vkontakte ID. The ID can be found in the link to your personal profile. Click save, then go to the <0> dialogue </0> with the <1> RQ Timer </1> group and write any message. After that, you will receive a notification via Vkontakte.
vk.qrDescription: You can go into dialogue with the RQ Timer group. Scan the QR code below

telegram.title: Receiving notifications via Telegram
telegram.description: Enter your Telegram username (@my_name, @username). Click save, then go to the bot and write to it or press /start. After that, the bot will send you notifications.
telegram.qrDescription: You can find our Telegram bot using a QR code. Scan the QR code below

deleteVkProfileModal.title: Deleting a Vkontakte profile
deleteVkProfileModal.description: You will no longer be able to receive notifications through Vkontakte

deleteTelegramProfileModal.title: Delete Telegram Profile
deleteTelegramProfileModal.description: You will no longer be able to receive notifications in Telegram

viewTelegramQRModal.title: Scan the QR code to go to the Telegram bot

viewVkQRModal.title: Scan the QR code to go to the dialogue with the VK group

logoutModal.title: Logout
logoutModal.description: Are you sure you want to log out?

emptySearch.text: No results were found for your request
emptySearch.description: Try searching for a different keyword.

groups.text: You have not entered any group yet
groups.description: Groups will appear here when you are added or you create a group

timers.text: There are no timers in this group yet
timers.description: Click on the plus sign to add a new timer

importTimers.text: You don't have personal timers yet
importTimers.description: When you add a personal timer, it will be available here

timerHistory.text: This timer has no change history yet
timerHistory.description: History will appear when the timer is removed/changed

groupHistory.text: There is no history of changes in this group yet
groupHistory.description: History will appear when one of the participants removes/changes the timer

members.description: When you add members to the group, they will appear here.

roles.text: There are no roles in this group
roles.description: When you add a role, it will appear here.

monsters.text: You don't have a single monster
monsters.description: To add a new monster, click on the plus sign

comments.description: To add a new comment, click on the plus sign

timers.description: Click on the plus sign to add a new timer

maxFileSize.message: The file size cannot exceed 3 MB

authErrorGoogle.message: An error occurred while trying to authorize

confirmEmail.title: Activate your account
confirmEmail.block_1: An email was sent to your email address <0>{{email}}</0> with a code to activate your account.
confirmEmail.block_2: If you have not received the letter, then try to send it again
confirmEmail.codeInputPlaceholder: Enter the code sent in the letter

activationErrorAlert.message: Activation failed. Please check if the code is correct

errorSendingEmail.message: An error occurred while sending the email

welcome.title: Welcome to RQ Timer
welcome.description: Broad functionality. Create private timers if you are playing alone. Or a group for your guildmates and friends. Use integrations to receive notifications. Enjoy your game :)
